article.headline: Boston College 76, Rhode Island 72
article.story: BOSTON (AP) -- Tyrese Rice scored 24 points and Rakim Sanders 21 to lead Boston College to a 76-72 win over Rhode Island on Wednesday afternoon. Shamari Spears had 12 points and 12 rebounds for BC. Biko Paris chipped in with 9 points -- six in the final 5 1/2 minutes -- for the Eagles (4-0). Will Daniels led the Rams (5-1) with 25 points and Lamonte Ulmer had 13. The game was tied six times in the second half before Rice's 3-point play pushed the Eagles ahead 67-64 with 3:50 to play. Daniels answered with a 3-point play after scoring from the paint and hitting a free throw on the Rams' ensuing possession, tying it for the seventh time and final time. Paris then hit short runner in the lane, pushing the Eagles ahead 69-67 with 3:04 left. Rice followed with a long 3-pointer from the left wing, but Ulmer had a basket for Rhode Island to cut it to 72-70 with 2:17 to go. Sanders them helped BC take control with a 3-pointer from the right wing, making it 75-70 with 67 seconds left. The Rams never threatened in the final minute. Rice, who shot just 4 for 15 in the opening half, hit consecutive 3-pointers as BC erased a seven-point deficit midway into the second half. The Rams had led 37-30 at halftime. Al Skinner, who coached at Rhode Island for nine years before coming to BC at the start of the 1997-98 season, earned his 200th win as the Eagles' coach.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
